name: @kronos-integeration/interceptor-message-handler
description: This interceptor cares about the handling of the messages. It will add the hops and copies the messages

scripts.cover: c8 -x 'tests/**/*' --temp-directory build/tmp ava --timeout 2m tests/*.mjs && c8 report -r lcov -o build/coverage --temp-directory build/tmp
scripts.docs: documentation readme ./src/module.mjs --section=API && documentation readme ./src/message-handler-interceptor.mjs --section=API && documentation readme ./src/index.mjs --section=API && documentation readme ./src/decode-json.mjs --section=API && documentation readme ./src/gunzip.mjs --section=API && documentation readme ./src/line-header-intercetor.mjs --section=API && documentation readme ./src/interceptor.mjs --section=API && documentation readme ./src/tokens2object.mjs --section=API
scripts.lint:docs: documentation lint ./src/module.mjs && documentation lint ./src/message-handler-interceptor.mjs && documentation lint ./src/index.mjs && documentation lint ./src/decode-json.mjs && documentation lint ./src/gunzip.mjs && documentation lint ./src/line-header-intercetor.mjs && documentation lint ./src/interceptor.mjs && documentation lint ./src/tokens2object.mjs
